original_title: Lixo Cerebral Vindo de Outro Espaço
overview: This was my first attempt at making a movie. It was unabashedly inspired by Edward D. Wood Jr.'s Plan 9 from Outer Space (1959), one of the culprits in making me want to write increasingly meaningless scripts (the other is Jesus Franco). Until the second order, the 20-minute copy of this film, which was never edited, is lost.
title: Lixo Cerebral Vindo de Outro Espaço
